page.title: 14My Home on Sunday.
page.content: It was morning. I got out of bed and I remembered last Sunday when I went netball with my Mum. It was bright and sunny.I went downstairs and said "Shall I feed the cat?" "No," said Mum "she's been fed." " COME ON DAD!." Dad came. Remember last Sunday? "Yeah" said Daniel. "Good wasn't it?" I ate my breakfast and then got dressed. I played a game with Daniel giving piggy-backs but he was ever so heavy and I soon got tired,so we went out to play 'WAR'. We played our War and I gave in."Hurray" shouted Daniel, "I won!". Some friends came to play rounders and I scored 7. It was time for tea. We looked at T.V. but is was boring so we went outside to play French cricket. "'Bye" said our friends, "thanks for tea." I got ready for bed. I think it has been even better than last Sunday.
